overview:
Sabiira Arefin, who holds an MBA from Duke University, is a leading entrepreneur with recognized successes in strategic planning and business development for high-growth start-ups and Fortune 100 companies.

After moving to Seattle, Arefin’s busy life didnâ€™t allow opportunities to meet her neighbors. Realizing there were many others in the same situation, she decided to create a social network site to connect neighbors with each other and build an online neighborhood. As a result, she co-founded LocalBlox alongside Ashfaq Rahman.
